评论详情: I’m petite and the XS fits me perfectly. The crop length hits me just above my hips and it looks great with leggings or flare leggings. Will likely get more colors!  Haven’t washed it, so I don’t know if it’ll shrink but like with most of my workout clothes, I wash on gentle and hang to dry.

Purchased this shirt in blue and black and love the way it fits. It’s an oversized, boxy cropped t shirt made from a very comfortable and lightweight fabric. Perfect with leggings to run around on a cool summer day!

I like the quality - much better than expected! Feels similar to a top from a popular high-end yoga brand. I was pleasantly surprised with the weight and feel of the cotton. It looks really nice, you could dress it up or down. Only comment is I have to size down compared to the size recommended to me by Amazon for a cleaner fit.
This shirt is so soft and comfy. I can wear it with pretty much anything, also. True to size & washed well.
Love this cropped tee! Very soft, comfortable, washes well. Bought in several colors! Im about 5’2, 120 xs is perfect!
I love crz products but this one was a no for me. I realize I bought a cropped tee but this was an odd crop fit. Too long to look cute and cropped but not long enough to tuck into a waistband.
I really like this top. It’s my second purchase of the same item. It’s perfect for hiking or working out. It’s the perfect crop length.
So comfy!

类型: Size: MediumColor: Tie Dye Smoke Ink
评论详情: Just what I’ve been looking for! I was in search of a short sleeve workout top that wasn’t tight but also wasn’t very baggy. I like a slight crop but not too much. This was absolutely perfect! It’s also very lightweight, which I enjoy because I sweat easily. I bought two more. I love the CRZY YOGA brand

This is the shirt I have been looking for! Great for the girls that want their cropped shirt to cover their bellies without having to tuck in extra fabric. Bought a medium and it is a great loose fit! I'm 5'9, 150lbs, and 34C.

类型: Size: SmallColor: Tie Dye Smoke Ink
评论详情: This top is so soft, perfect fit and true to size. I knocked off one star because unfortunately it does attract lint so I have to take a lint roller to it after every wash.

类型: Size: X-LargeColor: Tie Dye Smoke Ink
评论详情: I love the black camo burnout color. Nice shirt, not too cropped, so far the shirt has washed nicely, the collar has stayed flat. I went back and bought the lilac color. Good value for the money.

I read the reviews saying to size up and I did to a medium and it was a little more loose than I would look it too. So I recommend staying your true to size. I am a small and a medium and decided to go with medium for a looser fit but I wish I got the small. Other than that it is flattering and perfect to lounge in, wear to work or school! Not to cropped either!

This top is very versatile. I wear it with jeans and athletic wear - it looks great with both! It’s very lightweight and breathable which is great if you live in humid climates. The length of the shirt is great because it is at hip height, so not too short.  I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because it has become dingy over time with washes.
This shirt is perfect for workouts.
Love this style, the fit is similar to LLL Cates tee, but so many more colors! Looks great with everything I own.
This is the perfect crop top for working out or to wear with jeans. The material is VERY comfortable and it does not shrink in the wash/dryer.
I wear this at the bar when I work. I wear high wasted leggings and it cover tummy. I’m very self conscious about my mom tummy and this is a good crop top that’s long enough

This shirt is super light, perfect for hot summer. For being grey it doesn’t show sweat. Maybe slightly pricey? I feel like I see shirts like this cheaper at TJ Maxx / Marshall’s. But for the convenience of ordering on Amazon and being a shirt I’ll wear a lot -  I’d say, worth it!
A little bit gig

类型: Size: LargeColor: Tie Dye Smoke Ink
评论详情: The perfect length and I love the shape! I purchased it in 4 different colors!
My favorite simple cropped t shirt. I have it in multiple colors and wear on repeat. My only ask is that you make one with a v neck. Please please please.

I'm loving this cute crop workout top! The thin material makes it perfect for spring and summer workouts, but honestly, it's so versatile you can rock it while running errands too. It pairs effortlessly with shorts, leggings, or even a pair of jeans for a casual look. The colors are exactly as pictured, and as someone with a longer torso at 5'4" you can see where the top hits.
Very comfy shirt. Not too wide and good crop length. It does seem to stain easily.
Love these shirts so much I bought 2 other colors. Super soft, comfy and breatheable
Very light material which some might like! But it is totally sheer / see through which is not what I was looking for.
Good quality cotton, decent fit. Perfect for the gym.

It's a little shorter than I normally want, so if that bothers you size up. I'm usually a small but have a medium. I'd even maybe go up to a large but the medium is fine with high wasted shorts. It's really cute and flattering but made with athletic material so it handles sweat well and dries pretty quick.

I purchased this shirt in tan and black to go with a pair of pants. The shirt is very cute. Teh fabric is thin but not so thin that it is revealing specially with the lighter color. It is a short, and I do not long waisted, and very boxy. I do like the boxy style, but this was a bit too boxy for my pants. I did consider keeping it for the gym, but it was too short for my taste. With all that said i still thought I was a cute shirt just not right for my needs.
Love the fit of this top! It’s the perfect cropped fit. I need more colors!
Love this so cute and comfy definitely getting more colors
Didn't care for the lilac but would be great in other colors depending on skin tone

I live in these shirts - I have 3 now! This one is a little more of an off-white/soft yellow than an apricot-y color. They fit true to size. Expect them to be pretty cropped. I love working out in them or just lounging around. They're light weight and the pima cotton is super comfy. I care for them in the same way I do for my lululemon tops (which, by the way, these are a great dupe for!) - wash on delicate, cold, hang to dry. No pilling and I've had these for a while now!

评论概述: Super comfy gives Lulu lemon feels
评论详情: Soft fabric and great fit

I have ordered several colors in this top ever since the first one I tried! True to size, cropped but doesn’t show stomach if you’re wearing higher rise bottoms. Quality is great! I wash and put them in the dryer, no shrinking no changes!

Love this top for the price. Easy and flowy, light weight fabric. Not see through and washes nicely. Color options are great and I like that they match with a lot of other colors offered by the brand so you can mix and match. Definitely a more boxy and cropped fit. I’m 5’2-3” and it hits right at the top of the hips in size M

I wear this shirt while working out, and it’s perfect. The length is great and hits just above my hips. It is very lightweight and wicks moisture well. I love this brand, and recommend all of their clothing!!

评论概述: Thin and Breathable, but Definitely Not Sweatproof
评论详情: I got the bright blue color and it is such a nice shade.  The cut of the shirt is really flattering and it's a very lightweight, breathable material.  Depending on what you want to wear this for, it's not sweat proof at all.  I wore this to a kickboxing class and I had huge, wet sweat marks.  So depending on what you want or if visible sweat bothers you, certain colors may be better than others.
I love the fabric, the fit and the bright white color. Instantly became my favorite t now ordering in more colors.

评论概述: Perfect tee for coming and going.
评论详情: As a yoga instructor this BRAND and this tee are GREAT. I have them for essential everyday but mostly to/from classes and in basic colors. I love this BRAND and have multiple sets, tees and styles.

Compared to the lululemon basic white t, this is my preference and it's half the price. It's baggier which is more my speed, and less tight around the arms. I ordered a small and would usually purchase a 6 in tops at lululemon. It fits perfectly. I ordered two!
The material tends to attract hair, etc to stick to it but it’s really not too bad and overall I love it and am very satisfied!
This shirt is lightweight and comfortable. It does wrinkle if you don’t get it out of the dryer quick and also if you don’t hang it up. I still love it though
This is a cute, casual athletic top that pairs well with just about anything. Denim, athletic shorts, skirts, and more. Very versatile and comfy for hot weather.

So glad I purchased this t-shirt super comfy and sits at the waist not too short. I work from home and wanted comfy clothing and this fits the bill. I purchased a medium (36 D) perfect fit. Ordering more colors..

I'm going to be 100% honest -- if you have larger boobs, this probably isn't going to be very flattering with the boxy look, and it'll probably feel a little more cropped than the photos look. BUT, I found that if you take a little bunch from the back and tuck it loosely into your leggings, it looks super flattering! And more importantly, this shirt is insanely comfortable. Comfortable enough that, even before I discovered the tucking method, I ordered 2 more in different colors because I was willing to deal with the boxy cropped shirt w/big boobs problem for the feel of this fabric and the feel of the the breeze on my tummy!  Definitely recommend
Very comfortable, it’s cropped just the right amount. I have bigger arms and it doesn’t feel too tightly. It’s a great shirt

I love this shirt from CRZ YOGA and the color of light blue that I chose. It's a super comfortable and a flattering shirt that you can use for exercise or like me, wear around town with my favorite jean shorts.

类型: Size: MediumColor: Tie Dye Smoke Ink
评论详情: A close dupe to the Cates Tee pima cotton shirt from Lulu. Since the material is cotton, it makes for the perf gym shirt to sweat in. Goes great also with a pair of jeans or cargo pants. I have three colors already! I am 5'10" busty-ish, and a Medium fit me well. The bottom of the shirt hits my waistline, which I prefer, as I don't want to show my belly. Quality is great, and stands up well after many washes. I decided to avoid putting these shirts in the dryer to avoid any shrinkage--I am past my crop-top days!
The sizing was great and it fit perfectly put it was so see through. Even my clean white bra was visible.
I’m glad I bought this t shirt.  It is similar to a lululemon one.  Slightly different fit and material, but close.  Great price point, soft material, flattering.  I would buy more in the future.
This too was a great length as I am 5’8” and have a longer torso so it was not to short. The material is soft and quick drying for workouts as well.
Shorter then i imagined.  im 5'8 and seems a bit short for me.  It is a bit see-through as well.  But it is comfy.  Not worth the price really.
Comfortable & breathable fabric for working out!!
Love these shirts !
Oh I LOVE this tee. True to size, nice relaxed fit, and super soft material. I will be purchasing more colors.

评论概述: Just like Lululemon original cates tee!!
评论详情: So glad I found this because the cates tee on lululemons site has been completely redesigned and isn’t the soft airy tee it used to be. Best Amazon find EVER
This is the best dupe. It fits perfect and is the best crop. Not too much but just right above the hip bone. It hangs just right. The white is clean and sharp!
Honestly same quality at lulu. Love these

评论概述: Best cropped tee for whatever you're doing!
评论详情: This was my first jump into a more cropped tee and I love these! The material is great for whatever you want... working out, running errands, or just hanging out. The length of these are also great. I found them to not be too short and still have slight coverage of my midsection. In high waist jeans, they sit just below the top of the jean on me. I now have 6 colors of these tops!
I own these in multiple colors now! Love how lightweight without being see through they are! Super comfortable and cute!
Material is very thin and item came damaged with some black marks on the front
I’m 5’-2” and this is the perfect fit without being too cropped!

I agree that this shirt is just fine. Wouldn’t buy again. It was soft the first time I wore it but now it’s not as soft. It’s really thin which could be nice for some people but it’s just not doing it for me
Just buy it. I promise.

Feels and fits just like the cates t from lulu. I'm an avid lulu fan but i just had a baby and I'm not trying to replace all my clothes and getting comfortable at this size. I got one of these to wear to the gym until I'm comfortable wearing tighter workout tops which is what I'm accustomed to pre pregnancy, so that most of my clothes are. It's nice having something a little more modest until I'm feeling myself again.
Love these shirts from working out in them to wearing them daily.

I wanted to get some cropped tops to lounge around the house but I started to use them for outdoor hikes. The material is quite thin but very cute cutting. Comes in many colors too. Quick drying and true to size.

I didn’t expect this to be as short as it is but it isn’t totally a crop top and does cover enough so my belly isn’t showing while on the treadmill.  It’s soft and it washes well.  The green is a beautiful color.  It’s a good value.

The back is a little longer then the front after washing, so I would say it didn’t hold it’s shape after washing. It is a good length, not to cropped. The material is comfortable and breathable. It is a boxy fit. The pink color is true to the pic.

I wasn’t sure about this at first and was scared it was going to be too boxy but I wore it for multiple days straight when I first bought this because it’s SO comfy, good quality, and it is cropped without being too cropped ( no belly showing). Looks great with leggings and shorts- highly recommend!
Soft and hits right at the waistline of high wasted leggings/pants
I love this shirt. It is so cute, comfy and flattering! I will be ordering more colors!
Love this lulu dupe - TTS will be buying more colors

Fits perfectly. Love it for looks! But... I have to like work to keep it from getting wrinkled... If you throw it in a gum bag it will be wrinkled when you get it out... Would not buy again in white at least because the wrinkles show bad.
The price and quality are great! It’s a true crop so definitely dry on low or hang to dry! Perfect to paid with athletic skirts or shorts .

This shirt is great for the Florida heat and the cropped length is perfect for high-rise athletic shorts/leggings.  I’m a middle-aged mom not looking to show off too much skin, but still look stylish and fun.  The shirt fits the bill.  I wear it to my daughter’s softball tournaments and mange not to die of heatstroke, so 5 stars it is!

This shirt fits as expected! I love that you can dress it down with some workout clothes, or dress it up with jeans and some jewelry. The material is soft and comfortable. I’m 5’2 and the shirt was long enough and landed on my hip area so not a super revealing “crop top”. Will be ordering in more colors.

Love this and have already worn it multiple times! I love that it’s cropped but not too cropped. I’ve worn it with a tennis skirt and leggings and it hits at exactly the right place to not show my stomach. It is extremely comfortable and will 100% be buying more! I bought my normal size small and it’s exactly right for me even after washing and drying.

类型: Size: LargeColor: Tie Dye Smoke Ink
评论详情: It turned out to be a different fabric than expected. More of an athletic moisture wicking kind of fabric. Super soft, light, breathable, durable. Hope they add more designs to their collection because this is a huge win. Can’t get enough. Perfect for every outdoor adventurer, or anything really. Plus super cute. Will be buying more in different colors.

I’m super pleased with this top. It’s not too boxy or too slim. It appears cropped without really showing my stomach, which at 42 feels appropriate. For reference, I’m 5’3 with a longer torso relative to my legs. It has washed and dried perfectly too, and I have not noticed shrinkage or pilling.
I love this top.  It washes and dries nice too.  I ordered large but medium would have fit too.  I like my tops a little baggy. I am 5'4 169.  Now i have ordered several more colors.

Supposedly 92% cotton and 8% synthetic material.  I have other clothes with that percentage cotton and they do not feel like a polyester shirt.  This shirt has a higher percentage of synthetic.  Not a pleasant material. It will cling to your skin if you sweat.

类型: Size: MediumColor: Tie Dye Smoke Ink
评论详情: This top is the PERFECT amount of crop - cut to just hit the top of the hip bones so you aren't exposing stomach unless you are lifting your arms above your head.  Great for working out.  Wish there were more dark colors.
Fits fine, it's just quite thin. I wish it was a little thicker but it's nice on real warm days
I'm between a medium and large and went with a medium and it fits well. The material is thin so I'm hoping it holds up after multiple washes!
This is my new favorite top! I wear it to lounge in, work out, and pretty much whenever it’s clean. So comfy and great price

I really really love this brand. I have their leggings too. I like this cropped top a lot for working out. I’m not one to show off my mid drift at the gym, and this gives good coverage while still looking cute and stylish. If you’re wearing high waisted leggings or shorts, it won’t show any skin.
This is a cute top that is perfect for Florida since it is 100% cotton!

Love this shirt! The material feels like it’s moisture wicking but still mostly cotton which is important to me. It’s not super cropped - as a short girl, it’s full coverage (unless I raise my arms) but not too long like regular shirts are on me. It’s perfect and I’d order again.
Material bueno , el corte bien solo un poco “ pobrecita “ como textura , livianas
I normally wear Medium but sized up to keep this a little longer than a usual crop top.
Great color and length!
I love the fit of this shirt so much, I've ordered it in multiple colors. The color choices are so beautiful and the material is nice, soft and airy.
good quality perfect workout shirt.
It fits exactly as described and the fabric is soft and holds up well in the wash. I bought more than 1!
Cute cut , runs a little big. Stretchy and soft material
I am actually wearing this shirt right now. I love it so much! It is so comfy and cute. Great for working out and just for a normal casual outfit. Definitely recommend!
This crop tee is amazing. The quality is unmatched and holds up extremely well even after multiple washes. I always get compliments when wearing it and it is super soft!
The shirt has a great fit. Not too boxy. And has a bit of stretch. Super comfy too.
